com.genband.mobile.api.services.presence

Interface PresenceServiceInterface


  • public interface PresenceServiceInterface
    Interface used to access to the internal presence service implementation.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changePresenceStatus(Constants.PresenceStates presenceState, java.lang.String note)
      Changes the presence information related to the current user.
      void retrievePresence(java.util.List<java.lang.String> contactList)
      Retrieves the actual presence information about the stated contact.
      void retrievePresence(java.lang.String contact)
      Retrieves the actual presence information about the stated contact.
      void setPresenceApplicationListener(PresenceApplicationListener presenceApplicationListener)
      Sets the callback event handler for presence service.
      void startWatch(java.util.List<java.lang.String> contactList)
      Starts watching the presence information of the users defined in the input list.
      void stopWatch(java.util.List<java.lang.String> contactList)
      Stops watching the presence information of the users defined in the input list.
